name: 🧬They come at night - Demo
description:
*PLEASE PLAY THIS IN FULL SCREEN* (You can play in browser or download the executable file).

CONTROLS: W A S D, Tab for inventary, ESC to exit the game, Left click to shoot.

GAME RULES

— Each level is a checkpoint. If you die, you'll restart the level with low stats and keeping the items you had, so explore and craft as much as you want!

— Even if during the night your gun is stolen, you'll keep it if you equiped it.

— During the night, you'll lose health and an item.

— The survival system will low your health (from 0 to 4 points, randomly), thirst and hunger (2 points for each one) stats during time.

— Once you leave a level, you can't go back.

— Killing all enemies is not necessary, however they'll be a hard obstacle.

— Read the notes to understand the level objective.

— Have fun!

______________________________________________________________

Hello, internet! 👋

This is the third project I publish. This is the final project I created for my 1rst year studying videogames.

The challenge was to create things I wasn't comfortable (speaking of my knowledge and practice) coding, such as an inventory, crafting system, looting and diversity of levels.

I'm really proud and satisfied with the result, hoping everything I learned of this project will lead me to better projects in the future.

Please enjoy the game!
